attributes.action: No to the housing development in Twigworth & Innsworth
attributes.additional_details:
This is an objection to proposed housing development in Twigworth & Innsworth.

Its important to note these 2 sites have already been removed from the JCS plans for the area, yet Tewkesbury Borough Council are still looking at these plans.

The area is already liable to flooding as it runs along the river Severn. The other local villages already suffer seasonal flooding. Without proper flood defenses in place, the water displacement caused by such a big development will only make season flooding more regular wider reaching.

Aside of this issue, much of the infrastructure of the surrounding suburbs is already at breaking point. The areas roads simply couldn't cope with added pressure of over 2000 additional homes which in turn could easily see another 3000+ additional cars on the local roads.
